name: Semaglutide
description: A GLP-1 receptor agonist originally developed for type 2 diabetes and obesity management. Semaglutide mimics the action of the natural hormone GLP-1, enhancing insulin secretion, suppressing appetite, slowing gastric emptying, and promoting weight loss. Clinical studies have shown significant reductions in HbA1c and body weight, with additional benefits for cardiovascular health and metabolic syndrome.

name: Tirzepatide
description: A dual agonist of both GIP and GLP-1 receptors, Tirzepatide offers a novel approach to blood sugar and weight management. By simultaneously targeting two incretin pathways, it improves insulin sensitivity, reduces appetite, and leads to greater weight loss compared to GLP-1 agonists alone. It is used for type 2 diabetes and is under investigation for obesity and metabolic disorders.

name: Retatrutide
description: A next-generation multi-agonist peptide that activates GLP-1, GIP, and glucagon receptors. Retatrutide is designed to maximize metabolic benefits, including improved glucose control, enhanced fat burning, and substantial weight reduction. Early studies show promising results for obesity and metabolic syndrome, with potential cardiovascular benefits.

name: AOD 9604
description: A modified fragment of human growth hormone (HGH) that specifically targets fat metabolism without affecting blood sugar or growth processes. AOD 9604 accelerates lipolysis (fat breakdown) and inhibits lipogenesis (fat formation), making it a popular choice for weight loss and body composition improvement. It is non-anabolic and generally well-tolerated.

name: BPC-157
description: A synthetic peptide derived from a protective protein in the stomach, BPC-157 is renowned for its healing properties. It accelerates the repair of muscles, tendons, ligaments, and nerves, reduces inflammation, and supports gut health by promoting mucosal healing. BPC-157 is used in sports medicine and regenerative therapies for its broad tissue-protective effects.

name: BPC-157 / TB-500
description: This blend combines the regenerative power of BPC-157 with TB-500 (Thymosin Beta-4). Together, they provide synergistic effects for rapid recovery from injuries, enhanced tissue repair, reduced inflammation, and improved flexibility. Commonly used by athletes and in rehabilitation settings for musculoskeletal injuries and post-surgical healing.

name: Cagrilintide
description: An amylin analog that works with GLP-1 therapies to enhance appetite suppression and support weight loss. Cagrilintide mimics the action of amylin, a hormone co-secreted with insulin, to slow gastric emptying and increase satiety. It is often studied in combination with GLP-1 agonists for advanced obesity management.

name: CJC-1295 No DAC / Ipamorelin
description: A potent combination of two growth hormone-releasing peptides. CJC-1295 stimulates the release of growth hormone by acting on the GHRH receptor, while Ipamorelin selectively triggers GH secretion with minimal impact on other hormones. This blend supports muscle growth, fat loss, improved sleep, enhanced recovery, and anti-aging benefits.

name: Epithalon
description: A synthetic tetrapeptide that acts as a telomerase activator, supporting cellular longevity and healthy aging. Epithalon has been shown to extend telomere length, improve sleep quality, boost immune function, and enhance resistance to age-related diseases. It is used in anti-aging protocols and longevity research.
